item.text: Now in those days, when the disciples were growing in number, a complaint arose on the part of the Greek-speaking Jews against the native Hebraic Jews because their widows were being overlooked in the daily distribution of food.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> the <st data-num="1427" class="">twelve</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4341" class="">called</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="4128" class="">whole group</st><n id="3" /> of the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> together and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “It <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="701" class="">right</st> for <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> to <st data-num="2641" class="">neglect</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> to <st data-num="1247" class="">wait</st> on <st data-num="5132" class="">tables</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1980">carefully select</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> among <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> who are <st data-num="3140" class="">well-attested</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4134" class="">full</st> of the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> of <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> we may <st data-num="2525">put in charge</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">of</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="5532">necessary task</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> will <st data-num="4342" class="">devote</st> ourselves to <st data-num="4335" class="">prayer</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to the <st data-num="1248" class="">ministry</st> of the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st>.”

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3056" class="">proposal</st> <st data-num="700" class="">pleased</st> the <st data-num="3956" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="4128" class="">group</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">so</st><n id="2" /> they <st data-num="1586" class="">chose</st> <st data-num="4736" class="">Stephen</st>, a <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="4134" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> of the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">with</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="5376" class="">Philip</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="4402" class="">Prochorus</st>, <st data-num="3527" class="">Nicanor</st>, <st data-num="5096" class="">Timon</st>, <st data-num="3937" class="">Parmenas</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3532" class="">Nicolas</st>, a <st data-num="4339">Gentile convert to Judaism</st><n id="5" /> from <st data-num="491" class="">Antioch</st>.<n id="6" />

<st data-num="3739" class="">They</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stood</st> these men <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st>, who <st data-num="4336" class="">prayed</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="2007" class="">placed</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="2007">on</st> them.
The word of God continued to spread, the number of disciples in Jerusalem increased greatly, and a large group of priests became obedient to the faith.
Now Stephen, full of grace and power, was performing great wonders and miraculous signs among the people.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="5100">some men</st> <st data-num="1537">from</st> the <st data-num="4864" class="">Synagogue</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="3032" class="">Freedmen</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">(as</st> it was <st data-num="3004" class="">called)</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">both</st> <st data-num="2956" class="">Cyrenians</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="221" class="">Alexandrians</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">as well as</st> some <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2791" class="">Cilicia</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the province of <st data-num="773" class="">Asia</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="450">stood up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4802" class="">argued</st> with <st data-num="4736" class="">Stephen</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Yet</st><n id="1" /> they were <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2480" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="436" class="">resist</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> with <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> he <st data-num="2980" class="">spoke</st>.

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> they <st data-num="5260">secretly instigated</st><n id="1" /> some <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> to <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>, “We have <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="846">this man</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st> <st data-num="989" class="">blasphemous</st> <st data-num="4487" class="">words</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">against</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.”

They <st data-num="4787" class="">incited</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st>, the<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4245" class="">elders</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1122">experts in the law</st>;<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">then</st> they <st data-num="2186" class="">approached</st> Stephen,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4884" class="">seized</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="71" class="">brought</st> him <st data-num="1519" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="4892" class="">council</st>.<n id="4" />

They <st data-num="2476">brought forward</st> <st data-num="5571" class="">false</st> <st data-num="3144" class="">witnesses</st> who <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3973" class="">stop</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">saying</st> <st data-num="4487" class="">things</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> we have <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> the <st data-num="3480" class="">Nazarene</st> will <st data-num="2647" class="">destroy</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="236" class="">change</st> the <st data-num="1485" class="">customs</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="3860">handed down</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>.”
All who were sitting in the council looked intently at Stephen and saw his face was like the face of an angel.
